medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The jaundice began three days earlier, noted by his wife, and was followed by progressive lethargy, confusion, and subjective fevers. He experienced constant mild pain in the right upper quadrant unrelated to meals.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, diabetes, hyperlipidemia, gout. Previous laparoscopic cholecystectomy complicated by common bile duct injury, followed by hepaticojejunostomy.
medical_history.social_history: No history of tobacco, alcohol, or illicit-substance use. Never traveled outside the northeastern United States.
